subject: p17398573
Impression: PA and lateral chest compared to and : Moderate cardiomegaly has improved. Combination of mediastinal fat and possible middle lobe atelectasis should not be mistaken for pneumonia. Lungs are otherwise clear. There may be a very small new right pleural effusion. Thoracic aorta is generally large and tortuous but not focally aneurysmal. No evidence of tuberculosis.
